summary: Diff implements several Phase 5 polishing items: standardized animation utilities with reduced-motion support, route-level code-splitting via React.lazy/Suspense, improved offline sync status UI with a queue management dialog, and stronger error-state UI used in at least Shop and Dashboard. However, some requirements are only partially evidenced (notably per-route SEO meta handling and explicit image lazy-loading/sizing), and several new UI sections/components and docs appear that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: When queued mutation replay fails, the UI indicates how many actions remain queued and presents an English explanation that includes whether the failure is retryable (transient) vs non-retryable (permanent).
missing_requirements.reason: Offline sync UI shows remaining count and error text, and replay logic classifies errors as retryable/non-retryable, but the shown UI text does not clearly surface whether a failure is retryable vs permanent.

missing_requirements.requirement: Any image elements added in the UI use lazy loading where appropriate and include explicit sizing to avoid layout shift.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows an in HeaderNav with explicit sizing classes, but no lazy-loading attribute is shown; no other image lazy-loading/sizing changes are evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add/ensure appropriate meta tags (title/description) for the application and major routes.
missing_requirements.reason: Only frontend/index.html is shown with title and meta description; no evidence of per-route title/description management for major routes is present in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new homepage/section-level UI features (e.g., FeaturedCarousel, QuickLinksGrid, Announcements) not explicitly requested as part of Phase 5 polishing.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints include non-goal of adding new product features; these appear to be new content/features rather than polishing-only changes, based on the diff summary file list.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new About/Services content components (TeamSection, TimelineSection, ServiceDetailsAccordion) not explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the specified requirements; may constitute new page functionality/content beyond stated polishing scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Added documentation files (data-architecture.md, local-storage-strategy.md) not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: Documentation additions are not included in Phase 5 requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a ParallaxLayer effect component not explicitly requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-34 asks to standardize existing animations/interactions; adding a new parallax effect component is not requested and could be considered new interaction scope.
